body:
### Steps to reproduce

I just installed openfoam successfully. I want to continue my work, but when I load it, I report an error 
```
[root@spack spack]# spack find openfoam
==> 1 installed package
-- linux-centos7-cascadelake / intel@19.1.3.304 -----------------
openfoam@2006
[root@spack spack]# spack load openfoam
-bash: ==: command not found
```


### Error message

```
[root@spack ~]# spack --debug --stacktrace load openfoam
```

title: I can't load openfoam
